flawed_nl_solution:
Quinton had 40 cupcakes - 18 = <<40-18=26>>26 cupcakes.
He then had 26 cupcakes - 16 students = <<26-16=10>>10 cupcakes.
Quinton then gave away 10 - 1 - 1 - 1 - 1 = <<10-1-1-1-1=6>>6 cupcakes left.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
